main event: Two rotating, white lights were observed by reliable witnesses at Stewart AFB, New York, on April 4, 1954 from 1800-1915Z.
interesting points: The objects were observed at an altitude between 20,000 and 30,000 feet.
The objects were observed leaving lights and appeared to be descending.
An additional witness observed a similar unidentified object passing over the base at around 0015 on April 5, 1954.
The second object was observed traveling at a speed of approximately 100 miles per hour, changing direction, stopping, and climbing until it was no longer visible.
The report suggests that the two observations may have been of the same object.
sighted object: two rotating, white lights; one unidentified object with a single white light
